other_tests.findings: Intensely increased 18F-FDG uptake within the lesions from right adrenal (SUVmax 19.7, SUVaverage 11.9) and left kidney (SUVmax 9.4, SUVaverage 5.6).
Postoperative pathologic analysis was highly indicative of adrenocortical carcinoma.
Postoperative pathologic analysis revealed high-grade papillary renal cell carcinoma.
Diagnosis of hereditary leiomyomatosis and renal cell carcinoma syndrome combined with ACC.
